data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

A colossal island-world in the Vela Archipelago is tearing itself apart in a Mana-Core Eruption, a maelstrom of raw, volcanic mana and cosmic energy bursting from its core into the star-dusted nebula-sea. Towering plumes of brilliant red and violet light rip through the surrounding space, disintegrating smaller floating islands into glowing debris, as a lone, silhouetted Wayfinder starship navigates away from the cataclysm, framed against the overwhelming destruction.

Artist Credit: inspired by Frank Frazetta

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
